overview: The Morning Rise: A flower petal's soft touch cannot compare to the kiss of a lover for sweet beauty Blue Angel. • Blonde Massage: Buxom and beautiful Marry Queen offers to give Grace Hartley the most sensual of massages. • Dream Lovers: Bold beauty Zoey Kush wants to give Kris Slater a wakeup call he'll never forget. • Two Gems: Brunettes Caprice and Gabi exchange soulful gazes across the table before eventually their lust takes over and brings them together. • The Perfect Touch: When Tony Rivas offers Presley Hart a massage, she eagerly accepts.
title: Dream Lovers
